languages.text: "Наш старший сын, Маттис, в рядах планетарной стражи. Лорна, старшая дочь, посвятила себя врачеванию. А младшие Роно и Люми, к моему глубочайшему восторгу и удивлению, нашли свой путь в служении Богу-Императору и {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Наш старший сын, Маттис, служит в рядах даргонуской планетарной стражи. Лорна, старшая дочь, решила посвятить свою жизнь врачеванию. А младшие Роно и Люми, к моему глубочайшему восторогу и удивлению, нашли свой особый путь служения Богу-Императору и Экклезиархии".

languages.text: "Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. So is Lorna, our eldest daughter, though she has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Наш старший сын, Маттис, в рядах планетарной стражи. Лорна, старшая дочь, посвятила себя врачеванию. А младшие Роно и Люми, к моему глубочайшему восторгу и удивлению, нашли свой путь в служении Богу-Императору и {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархии{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Our elder son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. Lorna, our elder daughter, devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy."

"Our elder son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. Lorna, our elder daughter, devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy."

"Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. Lorna, our eldest daughter, has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy."

"Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. Lorna, our eldest daughter, has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the Ecclesiarchy."

"Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. So is Lorna, our eldest daughter, though she has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

"Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. So is Lorna, our eldest daughter, though she has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

languages.text: « Notre premier-né, Mattis, fait partie de la garde planétaire, de même que Lorna, notre seconde, bien qu'elle se soit consacrée à la médecine. À ma grande surprise et, je dois l'admettre, pour mon plus grand bonheur, nos deux derniers, Rono et Lumi, ont trouvé leur vocation en se mettant au service de l'Empereur-Dieu et de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. So is Lorna, our eldest daughter, though she has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Notre premier-né, Mattis, fait partie de la garde planétaire, de même que Lorna, notre seconde, bien qu'elle se soit consacrée à la médecine. À ma grande surprise et, je dois l'admettre, pour mon plus grand bonheur, nos deux derniers, Rono et Lumi, ont trouvé leur vocation en se mettant au service de l'Empereur-Dieu et de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g}. »

languages.text: «Nuestro hijo mayor, Mattis, pertenece a la guardia planetaria. Lo mismo pasa con nuestra hija mayor, Lorna, aunque ha optado por la medicina. Y para mi gran sorpresa y alegría, nuestros hijos menores, Rono y Lumi, han descubierto su vocación al servicio del Dios Emperador y la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. So is Lorna, our eldest daughter, though she has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro hijo mayor, Mattis, pertenece a la guardia planetaria. Lo mismo pasa con nuestra hija mayor, Lorna, aunque ha optado por la medicina. Y para mi gran sorpresa y alegría, nuestros hijos menores, Rono y Lumi, han descubierto su vocación al servicio del Dios Emperador y la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g}».

languages.text: 「長男のマティスは惑星軍に所属しております。長女のローナも医療関係に従事していますよ。そして嬉しい驚きなのですが、私共の下の子供たち、ロノとルミは、神帝陛下と{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}に仕えるという天職を見つけました」
languages.original_text: "Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. So is Lorna, our eldest daughter, though she has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「長男のマティスは惑星軍に所属しております。長女のローナも医療関係に従事していますよ。そして嬉しい驚きなのですが、私共の下の子供たち、ロノとルミは、神帝陛下と{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}に仕えるという天職を見つけました」

languages.text: “我们的大儿子马蒂斯在行星卫队服役，我们的大女儿洛娜也是，不过她从事的是医务工作。两个比较小的孩子，罗诺和露米，也已经找到了侍奉神皇与{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教{/g}教会的使命。这让我们非常惊讶，也非常欣慰。”
languages.original_text: "Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. So is Lorna, our eldest daughter, though she has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “我们的大儿子马蒂斯在行星卫队服役，我们的大女儿洛娜也是，不过她从事的是医务工作。两个比较小的孩子，罗诺和露米，也已经找到了侍奉神皇与{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教{/g}教会的使命。这让我们非常惊讶，也非常欣慰。”

languages.text: "Unser ältester Sohn Mattis ist bei der planetaren Wache. Genau wie Lorna, unsere älteste Tochter, obgleich sie sich der Medizin verschrieben hat. Und zu meiner großen Überraschung und Freude haben unsere jüngeren Kinder, Rono und Lumi, ihre Berufung in den Diensten des Gottimperators und der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} gefunden."
languages.original_text: "Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. So is Lorna, our eldest daughter, though she has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Unser ältester Sohn Mattis ist bei der planetaren Wache. Genau wie Lorna, unsere älteste Tochter, obgleich sie sich der Medizin verschrieben hat. Und zu meiner großen Überraschung und Freude haben unsere jüngeren Kinder, Rono und Lumi, ihre Berufung in den Diensten des Gottimperators und der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} gefunden."

languages.text: "En büyük oğlumuz Mattis, gezegen muhafızlarından. En büyük kızımız Lorna da aynı şekilde, gerçi o kendini ilaçlara adadı. Ufaklıklarımız Rono ve Lumi ise bizi hem şaşırtıp hem de gururlandırarak gerçek tutkularının Tanrı İmparator'a ve {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g}'ye hizmet etmede yattığını keşfettiler."
languages.original_text: "Our eldest son, Mattis, is on the planetary guard. So is Lorna, our eldest daughter, though she has devoted herself to medicine. And to my great surprise and elation, our younger children, Rono and Lumi, have found their vocation in serving the God-Emperor and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g}."
